languages.text: "Цикл может быть прерван... Знакомые слова". {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} звучит тихо и задумчиво, почти неслышный в шуме статики.{/n} "Предполагаю, что мне известен адресат, которому было доставлено сообщение в системе Фурибундус. Это — я. Омниссия, даруй мне мудрость постижения сей тайны".

traits.locale_text: "Цикл может быть прерван... Знакомые слова". {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} звучит тихо и задумчиво, почти неслышный в шуме статики.{/n} "Предполагаю, что мне известен адресат, которому было доставлено сообщение в системе Фурибундус. Это — я. Омниссия, даруй мне мудрость постижения сей тайны".

languages.text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."
languages.original_text: "Цикл может быть прерван... Знакомые слова". {n}Голос из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} звучит тихо и задумчиво, почти неслышный в шуме статики.{/n} "Предполагаю, что мне известен адресат, которому было доставлено сообщение в системе Фурибундус. Это — я. Омниссия, даруй мне мудрость постижения сей тайны".

traits.locale_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static.{/n} "I believe I know who the recipient was of the message in the Furibundus system. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to comprehend this mystery."

It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to comprehend this mystery."

It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

languages.text: "Der Zyklus kann unterbrochen werden ... Ich erkenne die Worte." {n}Die Stimme aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} ist sanft und nachdenklich, kaum hörbar über das Rauschen.{/n} "Ich glaube, ich kenne den Empfänger, für den die Nachricht im Furibundus-System bestimmt war. Ich war es selbst. Omnissiah, gewähre mir die Weisheit, dieses Mysterium zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: "Der Zyklus kann unterbrochen werden ... Ich erkenne die Worte." {n}Die Stimme aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} ist sanft und nachdenklich, kaum hörbar über das Rauschen.{/n} "Ich glaube, ich kenne den Empfänger, für den die Nachricht im Furibundus-System bestimmt war. Ich war es selbst. Omnissiah, gewähre mir die Weisheit, dieses Mysterium zu ergründen.

languages.text: « Le cycle peut être rompu... Je reconnais ces mots. » {n}La voix provenant du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} est douce et pensive, à peine audible par-dessus les parasites.{/n} « Je crois connaître le destinataire du message envoyé dans le système de Furibundus. C'était moi. Omnimessie, accordez-moi la sagesse nécessaire pour élucider ce mystère. »
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: « Le cycle peut être rompu... Je reconnais ces mots. » {n}La voix provenant du {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} est douce et pensive, à peine audible par-dessus les parasites.{/n} « Je crois connaître le destinataire du message envoyé dans le système de Furibundus. C'était moi. Omnimessie, accordez-moi la sagesse nécessaire pour élucider ce mystère. »

languages.text: “‘这个循环可以中止’……我记得这句话。”{n}帕斯卡沉思着，他的声音十分低沉，几乎被埋没在{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置的静电噪音中。{/n}“我相信，怒焰星系的那条信息就是发给我的。欧姆尼塞亚，请赐予我智慧，让我解开这个奥秘。”
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: “‘这个循环可以中止’……我记得这句话。”{n}帕斯卡沉思着，他的声音十分低沉，几乎被埋没在{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置的静电噪音中。{/n}“我相信，怒焰星系的那条信息就是发给我的。欧姆尼塞亚，请赐予我智慧，让我解开这个奥秘。”

languages.text: 「サイクルは断ち切ることが可能…その言葉には聞き覚えがある」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえる声は、優しい声色でどこか哀愁が漂い、雑音に紛れてほとんど聞こえない。{/n}「フリブンダス星系で送られた、メッセージの本来の送信相手を私はきっと知っている。万機神よ、この謎を理解する知恵を授けてください」
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: 「サイクルは断ち切ることが可能…その言葉には聞き覚えがある」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}から聞こえる声は、優しい声色でどこか哀愁が漂い、雑音に紛れてほとんど聞こえない。{/n}「フリブンダス星系で送られた、メッセージの本来の送信相手を私はきっと知っている。万機神よ、この謎を理解する知恵を授けてください」

languages.text: «El ciclo puede interrumpirse... Reconozco esas palabras». {n}La voz del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} es suave y pensativa, apenas audible por encima del ruido estático.{/n} «Creo que conozco al destinatario del mensaje en el sistema Furibundus. Soy yo. Omnissiah, concédeme la sabiduría para desentrañar este misterio».
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: «El ciclo puede interrumpirse... Reconozco esas palabras». {n}La voz del {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} es suave y pensativa, apenas audible por encima del ruido estático.{/n} «Creo que conozco al destinatario del mensaje en el sistema Furibundus. Soy yo. Omnissiah, concédeme la sabiduría para desentrañar este misterio».

languages.text: "Döngünün süreği bozulabilir... Sözler tanıdık geliyor." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vokstan{/g} gelen düşüncelere dalmış yumuşak ses, çıkan parazitin arasından zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Furibundus Sistemi'ndeki mesajın esasında kime gönderildiğini biliyorum zannedersem. Banaydı. Ey Hermesih, bu gizemi çözmek için bana bilgelik ihsan eyle."
languages.original_text: "The cycle can be discontinued... I recognise the words." {n}The voice from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} is soft and pensive, barely audible over the static noise.{/n} "I believe I know the intended recipient of the message in the Furibundus System. It was me. Omnissiah, grant me the wisdom to fathom this mystery."

traits.locale_text: "Döngünün süreği bozulabilir... Bu sözler tanıdık geliyor." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g}tan gelen alçak ve kederli ses, statik gürültünün arasından zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Furibundus Sistemi'ndeki mesajın esasında kime gönderildiğini biliyorum zannedersem. Banaydı. Hermesih duy sesimi, bu gizemi çözmek için bana irfan eyle."
